steps.title: Welcome to the MPP Portal
steps.description: This is the official Mentor-Protege Program Portal homepage. The DoD seal and program branding establish this as an official government resource.
steps.videoCaption: Welcome! Let me show you around the MPP Portal.

steps.title: Main Navigation
steps.description: Access Resources, Login to your account, or Register as a new user. The MPP Summit 2024 link provides conference information.
steps.videoCaption: Here's the main navigation - Resources, Login, and Register.

steps.title: Program Introduction
steps.description: The welcome message explains that both Mentors and Proteges use this portal to access their dashboards for tracking and maintaining partnerships.
steps.videoCaption: This welcome section explains what the portal is for.

steps.title: Access Your Dashboard
steps.description: Click 'Login to My Dashboard' to access your personalized MPP dashboard. You'll authenticate through Login.gov for secure access.
steps.videoCaption: Click this button to access your personalized dashboard.

steps.title: SAM Registration Requirement
steps.description: All MPP participants must maintain an updated SAM.gov profile. Click here if you need to update your System for Award Management registration.
steps.videoCaption: Don't forget - you need an updated SAM.gov profile!
